meanings.sent1: During yule, families gather to celebrate Christmas together.
meanings.sent2: Many people exchange gifts during the yule season.
meanings.sent3: The yule season brings joy and happiness to all.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of yule fills the air with warmth and love.
meanings.sent5: Children eagerly await the arrival of yule each year.

meanings.definition: A log burned in the hearth at Christmas
meanings.sent1: The crackling yule in the fireplace warmed the room.
meanings.sent2: Lighting the yule log is a traditional Christmas custom.
meanings.sent3: The yule log glowed brightly, filling the house with light.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the burning yule log filled the air with a cozy aroma.
meanings.sent5: The yule log slowly turned to ash as the night went on.

meanings.definition: A festival or feast at Christmas or the winter solstice
meanings.sent1: The village held a grand yule feast to celebrate the season.
meanings.sent2: Yule festivals often include music, food, and dancing.
meanings.sent3: At the yule festival, everyone enjoyed delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: The yule feast was a time for merriment and good cheer.
meanings.sent5: The yule celebration lasted late into the night with laughter and joy.
